sentences.english: Some of Guling's older villas have now been redesignated as museums or shrines.
sentences.chinese: 牯岭的一些老别墅如今被重新设计成博物馆或神殿。

sentences.english: And of the Levites， Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God， and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
sentences.chinese: 利未子孙中有亚希雅掌管神殿的府库和圣物的府库。

sentences.english: This temple on which you stand is the Chariot of Helios.
sentences.chinese: 你现在脚下的这座神殿正是赫利俄斯的太阳战车。

sentences.english: The ancient Greek Parthenon is famed for its beautiful sculpture in bas-relief.
sentences.chinese: 古希腊的帕台农神殿因其美丽的浮雕雕塑而闻名。

sentences.english: The temple on which Kratos stood, was the Sun Chariot of Helios.
sentences.chinese: 奎托斯脚下的这座神殿，就是赫利俄斯的日头战车。

sentences.english: The colonnaded temples of ancient Greece are famous.
sentences.chinese: 古希腊有柱廊的神殿十分著名。

sentences.english: After that day, I went to the temple and I reopened it before the people.
sentences.chinese: 那天之后，我来到神殿，并当众重开了神殿的大门。

sentences.english: After that day, I went to the temple and I reopened it before the people.
sentences.chinese: 那天之后，我来到神殿，并当众重开了神殿的大门。

sentences.english: The high priest Eli was terribly distressed to see the Ark of Covenant taken from the Holy of Holies.
sentences.chinese: 以利王哀伤的看着神的约柜被搬出神殿。

sentences.english: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.
sentences.chinese: 因耶和华我们神殿的缘故，我要为你求福。

sentences.english: For the sake of the house of the Lord our God, I will seek your prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 因耶和华我们神殿的缘故，我要为你求福。

sentences.english: The figure belongs to one of the colossi of the facade.
sentences.chinese: 该头像属于神殿正面的一尊巨像。

sentences.english: The seventh layer of Mount Celestia can be reached only by climbing the ziggurat.
sentences.chinese: 要到达天堂山的第七层只能从金字塔神殿向上攀登。

sentences.english: The temple had been rebuilt somewhere between 2150 and 1950BC.
sentences.chinese: 这座神殿是在西元2150至1950之间重建的。

sentences.english: I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.
sentences.chinese: 宁可在我神殿中看门，不愿住在恶人的帐棚里。

sentences.english: In despair he went to Aphrodite's shrine for help.
sentences.chinese: 绝望中，他来到阿芙罗狄蒂的神殿寻求援助。

definition: the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
